import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react" import { Image } from "react-bootstrap" import cookie from "react-cookies" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import API, { endpoints } from "../Configs/API" import ava from '../image/avatar.svg' import $ from 'jquery' import { toast } from "react-toastify" export default function AccountDetail(){ const [user,setUser] = useState(null) const [email,setEmail] = useState([]) const [phone,setPhone] = useState([]) const [address,setAddress] = useState([]) const [last_name,setLast_name] =useState([]) const [birthdate,setBirth_date] =useState([]) const [is_staff,setIs_staff] = useState([true]) const [booking_list_by_user,setBooking_list_by_user] = useState(null) const [change ,setChange] = useState(1) const avatar = useRef() const [is_open , setIs_open] = useState(false) const [is_open_add , setIs_open_add] = useState(false) // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps useEffect(async ()=>{ let res = await API.get(endpoints['current_user'],{ headers : { 'Authorization' : `Bearer ${cookie.load('access_token')}` } }) let resbooking = await API.get(endpoints['get_booking_detail_by_user'],{ headers : { 'Authorization' : `Bearer ${cookie.load('access_token')}` } }) setBooking_list_by_user(resbooking.data) setUser(res.data) setLast_name(res.data.last_name) setAddress(res.data.address) setEmail(res.data.email) setPhone(res.data.phone) setBirth_date(res.data.birthdate) },[change]) const change_all =()=>{ $('.form-control').removeAttr('disabled'); } const update_info = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() let resRegist = async()=>{ const formdata = new FormData() formdata.append("last_name" , last_name) formdata.append("email" , email) formdata.append("phone" , phone) formdata.append("address" , address) formdata.append("is_staff" , is_staff) formdata.append("birthdate" , birthdate) formdata.append("avatar" , avatar.current.files[0]) try{ let res = await API.post(endpoints['update'],formdata,{ headers:{ 'Authorization': `Bearer ${cookie.load('access_token')}` } }) console.info(res.data) toast.success('Thành Công!', { position: "top-bottom", autoClose: 5000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, }); setUser(res.data) setChange(10) }catch(er){ console.error(er) toast.warning('Có lỗi rùi!', { position: "top-bottom", autoClose: 5000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, }); } } resRegist() } let openMOdal = ()=>{ setIs_open(true) } let closeMOdal = ()=>{ setIs_open(false) } let openMOdal_add = ()=>{ setIs_open_add(true) } let closeModal_add = ()=>{ setIs_open_add(false) } if (user!==null && user!== undefined && booking_list_by_user !== null && booking_list_by_user !== undefined && booking_list_by_user!== ''){ console.log(booking_list_by_user) var a = document.querySelectorAll('.table_booking tr') for ( let i = 1 ; i < a.length ; i ++){ $(a[i]).mouseover(function(){ $(a[i]).css('border' , '1px black solid') }) $(a[i]).mouseleave(function(){ $(a[i]).css('border' , 'none') }) } return( <>
{user.last_name}
edit Sửa Hồ Sơ

) } else{ return( <>

) } } function test (props,key){ var a = props.created_date var index2 ="" a = a.replace(/[ZT]/g,' ') var from_index = a.indexOf(' ') for(let i = from_index; i <= a.length;i++){ index2 += a.charAt(i); } var r = a.replace(index2,"") return( {props.id} {props.customer[1]} {props.tour_name} {props.total} {r} {props.status2}
settings
delete_outline
) }
